      • getSecondsSinceMidnight

        protected static double getSecondsSinceMidnight​(long unixTime)
        Parameters:
        unixTime - the time as the number of seconds since the epoch. The epoch is referenced to 00:00:00 CUT (Coordinated Universal Time) 1 Jan 1970. For example, on Monday February 17, 1997 at 07:15:06 CUT, the value returned by 'time' was 856163706.
        Returns:
